metadata.name: Shaolin monk
metadata.description:
Monks from the Chinese Shaolin Monastery are widely known all over the world for their legendary kung fu. They are distinguished by calmness, will, fearlessness, indifference to all possible hardships and sufferings, and the greatest strength.

The main task of the monk is the improvement of the soul and body, so they train daily. They use their fighting skills only for the sake of self-defense. They prove that human possibilities are limitless.
